text: Hi all I’m trying to display blog posts with pagination. I’m looking to add a “latest post” in the header which would mean I need to remove the first post from the contents array. Does anyone know how I achieve this?
I don’t want to just intercept and ignore the first as that will mean 9 posts per page turn in to 8
:raising_hand: Roll call! Who else is here?

It would be great someone will help me.

Is it possible to mutli-select filters (select more than 1 tag at a time) in HS blogs?

You can count the loop, add special markup to the first then continue the loop.

When creating a new property for Tickets, you add it to a group. There are two options, "Ticket Information" and "Ticket Activity". How do I know which one to choose?
